alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oakland County through 730 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Royal Oak, or near Warren, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren around 645 PM EDT. Detroit Zoo around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Madison Heights, Pleasant Ridge, Clawson, Huntington Woods, Hazel Park, Ferndale, Berkley and Oak Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
